feed.title: GitHub PowerShell Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of PowerShell in GitHub

entry.title: yrifl/synvm
entry.summary:
Github Action 6 hours rdp.

-- SynVM --

https://remotedesktop.google.com/headless

Get to the Github Action tab select SYNVM and run the workflow and input the pin to whatever you want and it will be used later for login into the vm, for the CRD code you can click the link above and press the blue button twice and copy the PowerShell command and paste it into the CRD code field.

After configuring now its time to run the workflow, So the workflow installation ranges about 2 minutes (must be patient & refresh), after the crd step was done open this link https://remotedesktop.google.com/access and select the latest active VM, and input the pin you previously given.

The VM lasts for about 6 hours, Enjoy!! :3
